mapper.select: select concat(name, ':', phone_number), max( (select count(*) from sustc.public.handle h join sustc.public.transit t on h.record_id = t.record_id and (t.type = 1 or t.type = 4) where h.courier_id = c.id and t.city_id = (select g.id from sustc.public.city g where g.name = #{city})) ) as num from sustc.public.courier c where c.company_id = (select d.id from sustc.public.company d where d.name = #{company}) group by name, phone_number order by num desc limit 1;
